author: Thomas Bardwell
title: Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Rides Coronavirus Lockdown to Dazzling Success
description: The decade-long wait for Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord has seemingly not deterred fans, with over 165,000 currently playing on Steam. The post Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord Rides Coronavirus Lockdown to Dazzling Success appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• TaleWorlds Entertainments Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord launched on Steam Early Access today.
  • There are already over 165,000 people playing on Steam, while more than 225,000 streamed the game concurrently on Twitch.
